pullRequest.body:
and other simple measure lemmas

From PFR and LeanCamCombi

---

nodes.body: I have some minor edits I want to suggest but I need to grade an exam first. If I don't comment again in the next 14h, then ignore this comment.
I'm not in a hurry! Will wait for your suggestions :)

Changes I pushed to this branch:

- Rename `NullMeasurableSet.measure_compl` to `measure_compl₀` to match lemmas like `map_apply₀`, reorder, golf.
- Move `measure_preimage_eq_zero_iff_of_countable` right after `tsum_measure_preimage_singleton`, golf.
- Add `measure_null_iff_singleton`, generalize and golf `ae_iff_of_countable`, drop `ae_of_countable`.
- Move `AEMeasurable.nullMeasurable` close to your `AEMeasurable.nullMeasurableSet`. If you don't need your lemma very early, we can move both of them to where `AEMeasurable.nullMeasurable` was.
- Golf `map_eq_zero_iff` and `mapₗ_eq_zero_iff` using `measure_univ_eq_zero`.

Happy with the changes!

I don't need `AEMeasurable.nullMeasurableSet` very early, but I was expecting it very early! This is one of the first lemmas my brain goes to when thinking about null-measurability, and I would have expected it be very basic.

:v: YaelDillies can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).
bors merge

Build failed (retrying...):
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7239608361/job/19721670383)
Canceled.

Whoops, messed up `mod_cast`. Should be good now.

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7240110050/job/19722724963)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7240110050/job/19722724910)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7240110050/job/19722724848)

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion rw [← measure_congr h.toMeasurable_ae_eq, ← measure_compl (measurableSet_toMeasurable _ _)] ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion rw [← diff_compl, measure_diff_null']; rwa [← diff_eq] ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion rw [← diff_compl, measure_diff_null ht] ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion μ.map f s = μ (f ⁻¹' s) := map_apply₀ hf hs.nullMeasurableSet ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion rw [← map_eq_zero_iff hf.aemeasurable, map, dif_pos hf.aemeasurable, ```

Could you please search for `absolutelyContinuous_of_le_smul` and use the new lemma whenever it applies? Otherwise LGTM.
bors d+

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: Checking `ae` on a countable type
